pullRequest.title: Add Unit Test and Docs for GcsStreamingMessageSource Comparator
pullRequest.bodyText:
Followup to #2116 which added a comparator to sort the Blobs in a GCS bucket when being processed.
This adds an additional unit test and also mentions it in the docs.
Fixes #2117.

commit.message: Add unit test and docs for storage integration feature.
